name: Fool's Gold (Rithm Gaming)
description:
Errmmm Title says all.

You'd have to be a fool not to play.

But for real, it's fun.

W-jump / climb up

A-left / climb right

S-mine Gold / climb down

D- right / climb right

PS: This was made for a Game Jam put on by Youtuber Mark Brown and Game Maker's Toolkit. The challenge was use Dual Purpose design. You will notice if you give the game a play through that the Gold not only shines bright to increase your FOV, but also acts as currency to restore your hearts. Choose wisely!
